about_the_game:
Get ready to roll and kick your way to victory in the most unpredictable soccer game you’ve ever played! Improbable Soccer is the ultimate party game that brings friends together, whether they’re soccer enthusiasts or not.

SIMPLE IS BETTER

Ditch the complex multiplayer games and dive into a world where everyone is welcome. Improbable Soccer is crafted for ease of play, yet it promises a challenge that will keep you coming back for more.

WIN AT ALL COST

Forget about the rules of soccer; this game is all about triumph. With no fuss over controls or camera angles, you’re free to focus on what matters most—dominating the field and leading your team to glory.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MADNESS

Choose your friends, and take on the world of Improbable Soccer. Whether you’re chilling on your couch or competing remotely with Steam Play Remote, up to 6 players can join in the action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“Improbable Soccer is still in its infancy and shows something to file. In any case, it can potentially be a really interesting title because it offers a light-hearted version of football. The gameplay suitable for everyone is simple, immediate and direct. You don't have to be a football fan to enjoy this title: the rules are simple, run, move, roll, jump, hit the ball and score. The title offers the best of itself when played in the company both in presence and online and it is clear that with the necessary precautions, Cyberlab Studios can aim high. It goes without saying that we await further updates on gameplay and content. We are sure that with some adjustments we could talk about something sensational.”
IlVideogioco

“The gaming experience at the moment is limited because it is a bit cumbersome to have fun in company, but the good thing is that with remote play it is not necessary for everyone to have the game. Undeniably, it's still an incomplete product and needs some tweaking (and updating), but the base is good and has a lot of potential. Playing alone can become a bit repetitive in a matter of minutes, but if you have someone to involve, laughter and fun are guaranteed, even if you miss an empty goal or score an own goal.”
Gaming Italiano
short_description: Dive into a soccer game that’s as unpredictable as it is fun. With simple controls and intense gameplay, it’s perfect for friends to enjoy together. Up to 6 players can join in, making it ideal for both casual and competitive play.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
